palamu abhimansala suwa sahana madhyasthanaya anuradhapuraye da ,dewanna kambaurupitiyeda idikara thibe.pangolle wiwrutha kerena thunwani abhimansala suwa sahana madhyasthanaye purna aabadhitha ranawiruwan panas dedenekuta pahasukam salase.me madhyasthanaye ek ranawiruwaku rakabala ganima sadaha aahara saha waidya prathikara wenuwen masakata waya kerena mudala rupiyal this ek dahas eka siyayaki.me madhyasthanaya idikirima sadaha me wana wita rupiyal miliyana thunsiya anuwaka mudalak waya kara thibe.thawath thotas kihipayak idi kala yuthuwa athi athara ee sadaha parithyagashilinge aadhara upakara apeksha karana bawa yuda hamuda punaruththapana adhyathsha janaral mejar janaral mano perera mahatha pawasiya.purna aabadhitha thaththwayata pathwa athi ranawiruwange sankhyawa hathsiyayakata aasanna bawath, me athurin thunsiya thispas deneku siya niweswala sitina bawath me pirisata idiriyedi mewani abhimansala suwa sahana madhyasthana thawath dekakwath idikala yuthuwa athi bawath mano perera mahatha wadiduratath pawasiya..
